summary: In a hotel room in Paris, a doctor comes out of the shower and finds that his wife has disappeared. He soon finds himself caught up in a world of intrigue, espionage, gangsters, drugs and murder.
cast: Harrison Ford|Betty Buckley|Emmanuelle Seigner|Djiby Soumare|Dominique Virton|Gérard Klein|Stéphane D'Audeville|Laurent Spielvogel|Alain Doutey|Jacques Ciron|Roch Leibovici|Louise Vincent|Patrice Melennec|Ella Jaroszewicz|Joëlle Lagneau|Jean-Pierre Delage|Marc Dudicourt|Artus de Penguern|Dominique Pinon|Richard Dieux|Yves Rénier|Robert Ground|Bruce Lester-Johnson|Michael Morris|Claude Doineau|John Mahoney|Jimmie Ray Weeks|Alan Ladd|André Quiqui|Thomas M. Pollard|Böll Boyer|Tina Sportolaro|David Huddleston|Alexandra Stewart|Robert Barr|Patrick Floersheim|Marcel Bluwal|Isabelle Soimaud|Fonky French Family|Yorgo Voyagis|David Jalil|Jean-Claude Houbart|Raouf Ben Amor|Stéphane Copeau|Angela Featherstone|Roman Polanski|Marco Prince
keywords: hotel room|espionage|american in paris|husband wife relationship|paris france
title: Frenético
